boardgame.name: Cry Havoc
boardgame.description: A man-to-man medieval combat wargame. Each side is comprised of peasants, sergeants, bills, men-at-arms, and knights. Various scenarios are included in the rules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Outremer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Cry Havoc series page contains information about the game system and history of the game including fan expansions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Cry Havoc: The Welsh Castle with Wharf

Well-played and abused copy. Missing one (?) counter. The box cover has heavy concavity and wear and there is a price and the word _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Damaged_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; written on the cover. The rules and counters are all in at least _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; condition. Both maps have some stains, most easily seen on the back. One of the maps you can hardly see any of the stain because of the color of the terrain. COUNTERS Knights - All four counters for each are present. Other characters - One of the billmen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s counters (Guy 10-6-6) is missing. All others accounted for. Info markers - There are 14 Ransom counters. I have no idea how many there should be.

This is the Standard Games English edition. Partly unpunched. Would be very good, except that one map sheet has a 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; brown stain on the back whch has come through on the front. Does not effect play and is not intrusive. Slight bowing to box.

as new, english release FREE SHIPPING TO EUROPE AND NORTH AMERICA !!! Any boardgames order from this list starting from: $250 and above (EU zone) $360 and above (rest of Europe) $500 and above (USA and Canada) will ship FOR FREE, including sturdy package and tracking number !!! This is the French version although the game itself is language independent except for the rules which can be downloaded from the fan site or BGG in English. The box contains the following: - rules book and background to the Cry Havoc (Regles du jeu) - booklet with historical context and the characters (Le contexte historique et les personnages) - scenarios booklet (Les Scenarios) - flyer – Cry Havoc a quick description (advertising – Cry Havoc pas de quartier) - 4 x quick reference sheets (Fiches de jeu avec les regles principales) - 2 all the original counters neatly punched and bagged – I have checked them all against the Cry Havoc fan site and they are ALL there; - 1 d10 - 1 map of the village (English language) - 2 x map of the crossroads (THAT IS ONE MAP MORE THAN THE ORIGINAL) - 2 x map of the forest (THAT IS ONE MAP MORE THAN THE ORIGINAL – this map is rare) The box has minimal wear and looks new you will not easily find another one in this condition let alone better condition. I am selling another 10 games from the cry havoc series. If you buy more than one I will discount the total price by 10% for every game you buy to a maximum of 50% reduction on the total. Cost of mailing to: Belgium: 9 euro Neighboring countries to Belgium (including UK): 13 euro USA and rest of Europe and countries in the Mediterranean area: 13 euro Rest of the world: 21 euro Payment within Europe - please by bank transfer

Cry Havoc Two-player English man-to-man medieval combat on laminated map between knights and soldiers - echoes miniature gaming. Simple combat system. From Standard Games (UK). Long out of print. contains rules, scenarios and historical booklets, counters with plastic tray, interlocking maps, charts. Box in Good condition, contents Very Good, maps Like New. BGG reports cheapest copy for sale worldwide is $63 (converted from Euros), and none in North America. Your price: $30. I will accept PayPal if you add 5% to the total order. For details: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/1323/cry-havoc
PLAYED ONCE ONLY MINOR WEAR ON BOX
